review: This thing is freaking awesome.  Works so much better and faster than our older Roku.  Once HBO go comes out on it we'll be set.
author: David Blumer

review: I replaced a Roku Gen1 box with this. The Fire Stick menus are slow and cumbersome.Gave it away and went back to my Roku.
author: Wally Cowart

review: Much better than Apple, used previously.  We are really enjoying it...
author: Elnord

review: Love it! It was crazy easy to install. It makes watching Amazon Prime and Netflix so much more convenient to watch on my big screen. I am very pleased with the Fire Stick!
author: CDPmom3
